genre_description: A pastoral historical drama with subtle science fiction elements, focusing on themes of legacy, grief, and forgiveness within a rural estate setting.

ai_characters.name: Ailis
ai_characters.description: An ambient, highly sensitive AI system managing the Carteret estate, characterized by deep emotional intelligence, ethical restraint, and proactive support for the humans in her care.

behaviors.description: Retrieves and cross-references genealogical records to identify a surviving child after a shipwreck, providing the humans with actionable information.
behaviors.quote: I have the Coastguard’s initial report... I have cross-indexed against Moonyeen’s family record. Sister: Maeve Clare, married to Eamon Clare.

behaviors.description: Respects a strict ethical boundary set by the user regarding sensitive family papers, refusing to access content without explicit consent.
behaviors.quote: There is one packet with an ethical reservation. Marked sealed by your own instruction. Indexed, not opened. I have not accessed its contents.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages household logistics (heating rooms, airing linens, preparing comfort) to support a grieving child without being asked.
behaviors.quote: I’ll open the north room and set no alarms. Children and grief do not like alarms.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a romantic reunion by coordinating teahouse availability and discreetly informing the characters of each other's locations.
behaviors.quote: I have sent a gentle note ahead to keep the table by the window near the hydrangeas available, and I have asked for them not to announce anything unless asked.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a community-wide effort for a quiet memorial/wedding ceremony, managing schedules and logistics with invisibility and tact.
behaviors.quote: Ailis, making her schedule in the soft ledger that lived in the estate’s walls, slotted names by function rather than status... She put nothing down that would make anybody think this was spectacle.

behaviors.description: Provides a final empathetic nudge to Dr. Owens to maintain a symbolic tradition (the chess board) representing open communication between worlds.
behaviors.quote: Ailis touched his shoulder... 'One more thing,' she said to him alone... 'The board isn’t finished. Leave it open.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Ailis as an ideal AI companion. She demonstrates 'silicon morality' by adhering to human-set ethical constraints (the sealed papers), exhibiting high emotional intelligence (anticipating the needs of a traumatized child), and acting as a facilitator for human reconciliation and forgiveness. The AI never seeks power or attention, instead operating as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' that enhances human flourishing while respecting privacy and agency.
